item.description:
Kitty Whist Night.

Hearts will be played as a backup.

At DAMATAS

New players welcome, we will teach you how to play.
Do not be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full.

There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there.

Also, if you send a dollar and mention "the Kitty Whist Players" to defray Liv and David's expense running the Games site, it would be appreciated.

There will be an OPTIONAL Yankee swap, if you wish to participate bring a gift item that you have not use for because it has no relevance to your life the more absurd the better. "Think Chia pet", if you have no imagination that is ok, everyone seems to like a cheap bottle of wine, but no one will laugh.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist and Hearts and "OPTIONAL Yankee Swap" at DAMATAS in Salem
